title: My email was closed now i cant change my email/password
body: my email account was closed at @outlook.com cuz i didnt access it for a year(only used it for this game) how do i go about changing my email/password now since the other email is permanently closed. (ive already tried calling microsoft) nothing they can do.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Your best bet would be to [submit a ticket to Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) for assistance regarding this matter.
